src:
Simon McMenemy Berpeluang Masih Melatih Timnas Indonesia Kontra Malaysia
04 Nov 2019, 17:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Indonesia akan kembali berhadapan dengan Malaysia pada putaran kedua Kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2022 Zona Asia Grup G. Duel kedua negara bakal berlangsung di Stadion Nasional Bukit Jalil, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, pada 19 November 2019.
Lantas siapa pelatih Timnas Indonesia untuk laga tersebut?
Skuat Garuda kemungkinan besar masih dilatih oleh Simon McMenemy. Jasa arsitek asal Skotlandia itu masih dipakai lantaran PSSI masih mengkaji pelatih yang pas untuk Timnas Indonesia.
"Oh ya untuk sementara kita masih Simon karena kita takut nanti malah belum pas ya dengan pergantian," ujar Ketua Umum (Ketum) PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan, di Kantor Kemenpora, Senayan, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
"Yang penting kita maksimalkan dulu ya, kita akan mencari, menganalisa yang kira-kira yang pas untuk kita nanti," katanya menambahkan.

text:
Simon McMenemy Has the Chance to Still Train the Indonesian National Team Counter Malaysia
Nov 04 2019, 17:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian national team will return to face Malaysia in the second round of the 2022 World Cup Qualification Asian Zone Group G. The duel of the two countries will take place at Bukit Jalil National Stadium, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, on November 19, 2019.
So who is the Indonesian national team coach for the match?
The Garuda squad is most likely still being trained by Simon McMenemy. The Scottish architectural service is still used because PSSI is still studying the right coach for the Indonesian national team.
"Oh yes, for the time being we are still Simon because we are afraid that in the future we will not be right yet," said PSSI General Chairman, Mochamad Iriawan, at the Kemenpora Office, Senayan, Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
"The important thing is we maximize it first, we will look for it, analyze what is more appropriate for us later," he added.
